name: The First Beat, Ever
description:
When going for the topic of "the first ever", I thought of an idea that you are only ever given one moveset. Ever... And its in a form of a beat. 

In this game, as a result of this exploration, you can move freely horizontally, but for actions like Jumping and Attacking, you have to FOLLOW the BEAT !! :D

So here you have it, my incomplete, but just a tiny bit amusing game with some procedural music samples, explosions, physics and a bit broken animation controller. :D

---------------------------------------------

Controls (PC Only):

Movement - WASD

Jump - Spacebar

Attack/Button clicks - Left Mouse Key

---------------------------------------------

Assets Used (separate word of thanks):

  • 2D Destruction
  • 2D Assets Pack
  • Kenney Fonts
  • Character Animation Pack
  • Explosions Animation Pack
